column1: Bondi Beach is one of Australia's most well-known beaches and among the world's most fame.
column2: Bondi Beach is one of Australia's most well-known beaches and among the world's most famous.

column1: Bondi Beach is located in a suburb of Sydney, 7 kilometres east of the Sydney centrality business district.
column2: Bondi Beach is located in a suburb of Sydney, 7 kilometres east of the Sydney central business district.

column1: Bondi is said to be a corruption of an Aboriginal word boondi meaning water breakable over rocks.
column2: Bondi is said to be a corruption of an Aboriginal word boondi meaning water breaking over rocks.
